name: Mystery Masters: The Secret Stories Collection
summary:
Mystery Masters: The Secret Stories Collection includes;
- Vampire Mansion: A Linda Hyde Mystery
- The Stolen Venus
- The Stolen Venus 2
- Vanished in Rome
- The Chronicles of Shakespeare: Romeo & Juliet
- Echoes of Sorrow
- Crystal Skulls: The Sandra Fleming Chronicles
-Snarkbusters: Welcome to the Club
- Snarkbusters 2: All Revv'Ed Up
- Amanda Rose: Game of Time
- The Secret of Casanova
- Angel Code
- Soul Journey
- Legend of a Volcano*
- Lost Lagoon: The Trail of Destiny*
